00124 template<typename PointDataTreeType>
00125 struct CopyGroupOp {
00126 
00127     typedef typename tree::LeafManager<PointDataTreeType>       LeafManagerT;
00128     typedef typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange                    LeafRangeT;
00129     typedef AttributeSet::Descriptor::NameAndType               NameAndType;
00130     typedef AttributeSet::Descriptor::GroupIndex                GroupIndex;
00131 
00132     CopyGroupOp(PointDataTreeType& tree,
00133                 const GroupIndex& targetIndex,
00134                 const GroupIndex& sourceIndex)
00135         : mTree(tree)
00136         , mTargetIndex(targetIndex)
00137         , mSourceIndex(sourceIndex) { }
00138 
00139     void operator()(const typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange& range) const {
00140 
00141         for (typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange::Iterator leaf=range.begin(); leaf; ++leaf) {
00142 
00143             GroupHandle sourceGroup = leaf->groupHandle(mSourceIndex);
00144             GroupWriteHandle targetGroup = leaf->groupWriteHandle(mTargetIndex);
00145 
00146             for (IndexIter iter = leaf->beginIndexAll(); iter; ++iter) {
00147                 const bool groupOn = sourceGroup.get(*iter);
00148                 targetGroup.set(*iter, groupOn);
00149             }
00150         }
00151     }
00152 
00154 
00155     PointDataTreeType&      mTree;
00156     const GroupIndex        mTargetIndex;
00157     const GroupIndex        mSourceIndex;
00158 };
00159 
00160 
00161 template <typename PointDataTree, typename PointIndexTree, bool Remove>
00162 struct SetGroupFromIndexOp
00163 {
00164     typedef typename tree::LeafManager<PointDataTree>   LeafManagerT;
00165     typedef typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange            LeafRangeT;
00166     typedef typename PointIndexTree::LeafNodeType       PointIndexLeafNode;
00167     typedef typename PointIndexLeafNode::IndexArray     IndexArray;
00168     typedef AttributeSet::Descriptor::GroupIndex        GroupIndex;
00169     typedef std::vector<bool>                           BoolArray;
00170 
00171     SetGroupFromIndexOp(const PointIndexTree& indexTree,
00172                         const BoolArray& membership,
00173                         const GroupIndex& index)
00174         : mIndexTree(indexTree)
00175         , mMembership(membership)
00176         , mIndex(index) { }
00177 
00178     void operator()(const typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange& range) const
00179     {
00180         for (typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange::Iterator leaf=range.begin(); leaf; ++leaf) {
00181 
00182             // obtain the PointIndexLeafNode (using the origin of the current leaf)
00183 
00184             const PointIndexLeafNode* pointIndexLeaf = mIndexTree.probeConstLeaf(leaf->origin());
00185 
00186             if (!pointIndexLeaf)    continue;
00187 
00188             // obtain the group attribute array
00189 
00190             GroupWriteHandle group(leaf->groupWriteHandle(mIndex));
00191 
00192             // initialise the attribute storage
00193 
00194             Index64 index = 0;
00195 
00196             const IndexArray& indices = pointIndexLeaf->indices();
00197 
00198             for (typename IndexArray::const_iterator it = indices.begin(),
00199                                                      it_end = indices.end(); it != it_end; ++it)
00200             {
00201                 if (Remove) {
00202                     group.set(index++, mMembership.at(*it));
00203                 }
00204                 else {
00205                     if (mMembership.at(*it))    group.set(index, true);
00206 
00207                     index++;
00208                 }
00209             }
00210         }
00211     }
00212 
00214 
00215     const PointIndexTree& mIndexTree;
00216     const BoolArray& mMembership;
00217     const GroupIndex mIndex;
00218 }; // struct SetGroupFromIndexOp

00223 
00225 class GroupInfo
00226 {
00227 public:
00228     typedef AttributeSet::Descriptor Descriptor;
00229 
00230     GroupInfo(const AttributeSet& attributeSet)
00231         : mAttributeSet(attributeSet) { }
00232 
00234     static size_t groupBits() { return sizeof(GroupType) * CHAR_BIT; }
00235 
00238     size_t unusedGroups() const
00239     {
00240         // compute total slots (one slot per bit of the group attributes)
00241 
00242         const size_t groupAttributes = mAttributeSet.size(AttributeArray::GROUP);
00243 
00244         if (groupAttributes == 0)   return 0;
00245 
00246         const size_t totalSlots = groupAttributes * this->groupBits();
00247 
00248         // compute slots in use
00249 
00250         const AttributeSet::Descriptor::NameToPosMap& groupMap = mAttributeSet.descriptor().groupMap();
00251         const size_t usedSlots = groupMap.size();
00252 
00253         return totalSlots - usedSlots;
00254     }
00255 
00257     bool canCompactGroups() const
00258     {
00259         // can compact if more unused groups than in one group attribute array
00260 
00261         return this->unusedGroups() >= this->groupBits();
00262     }
00263 
00265     size_t nextUnusedOffset() const
00266     {
00267         const Descriptor::NameToPosMap& groupMap = mAttributeSet.descriptor().groupMap();
00268 
00269         // build a list of group indices
00270 
00271         std::vector<size_t> indices;
00272         for (Descriptor::ConstIterator  it = groupMap.begin(),
00273                                         endIt = groupMap.end(); it != endIt; ++it) {
00274             indices.push_back(it->second);
00275         }
00276 
00277         std::sort(indices.begin(), indices.end());
00278 
00279         // return first index not present
00280 
00281         size_t offset = 0;
00282         for (std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator    it = indices.begin(),
00283                                                     endIt = indices.end(); it != endIt; ++it) {
00284             if (*it != offset)     break;
00285             offset++;
00286         }
00287 
00288         return offset;
00289     }
00290 
00292     void populateGroupIndices(std::vector<size_t>& indices) const
00293     {
00294         const Descriptor::NameToPosMap& map = mAttributeSet.descriptor().map();
00295 
00296         for (Descriptor::ConstIterator  it = map.begin(),
00297                                         itEnd = map.end(); it != itEnd; ++it) {
00298 
00299             const AttributeArray* array = mAttributeSet.getConst(it->first);
00300             if (GroupAttributeArray::isGroup(*array)) {
00301                 indices.push_back(it->second);
00302             }
00303         }
00304     }
00305 
00308     bool requiresMove(Name& sourceName, size_t& sourceOffset, size_t& targetOffset) const {
00309 
00310         targetOffset = this->nextUnusedOffset();
00311 
00312         const Descriptor::NameToPosMap& groupMap = mAttributeSet.descriptor().groupMap();
00313 
00314         typedef Descriptor::NameToPosMap::const_reverse_iterator ReverseMapIterator;
00315 
00316         for (ReverseMapIterator it = groupMap.rbegin(),
00317                                 itEnd = groupMap.rend(); it != itEnd; ++it) {
00318 
00319             // move only required if source comes after the target
00320 
00321             if (it->second >= targetOffset) {
00322                 sourceName = it->first;
00323                 sourceOffset = it->second;
00324                 return true;
00325             }
00326         }
00327 
00328         return false;
00329     }
00330 
00331 private:
00332     const AttributeSet& mAttributeSet;
00333 }; // class GroupInfo

00342 template <typename PointDataTree>
00343 inline void appendGroup(PointDataTree& tree, const Name& group)
00344 {
00345     typedef AttributeSet::Descriptor                              Descriptor;
00346     typedef AttributeSet::Util::NameAndType                       NameAndType;
00347 
00348     using point_attribute_internal::AppendAttributeOp;
00349     using point_group_internal::GroupInfo;
00350 
00351     typename PointDataTree::LeafCIter iter = tree.cbeginLeaf();
00352 
00353     if (!iter)  return;
00354 
00355     const AttributeSet& attributeSet = iter->attributeSet();
00356     Descriptor::Ptr descriptor = attributeSet.descriptorPtr();
00357     GroupInfo groupInfo(attributeSet);
00358 
00359     // don't add if group already exists
00360 
00361     if (descriptor->hasGroup(group))    return;
00362 
00363     // add a new group attribute if there are no unused groups
00364 
00365     if (groupInfo.unusedGroups() == 0) {
00366 
00367         // find a new internal group name
00368 
00369         const NameAndType groupAttribute(descriptor->uniqueName("__group"), GroupAttributeArray::attributeType());
00370 
00371         descriptor = descriptor->duplicateAppend(groupAttribute);
00372 
00373         // insert new group attribute
00374 
00375         AppendAttributeOp<PointDataTree> append(tree, groupAttribute, descriptor,
00376                                                 /*hidden=*/false, /*transient=*/false, /*group=*/true);
00377         tbb::parallel_for(typename tree::template LeafManager<PointDataTree>(tree).leafRange(), append);
00378     }
00379 
00380     // ensure that there are now available groups
00381 
00382     assert(groupInfo.unusedGroups() > 0);
00383 
00384     // find next unused offset
00385 
00386     const size_t offset = groupInfo.nextUnusedOffset();
00387 
00388     // add the group mapping to the descriptor
00389 
00390     descriptor->setGroup(group, offset);
00391 }

00397 template <typename PointDataTree>
00398 inline void appendGroups(PointDataTree& tree,
00399                          const std::vector<Name>& groups)
00400 {
00401     // TODO: could be more efficient by appending multiple groups at once
00402     // instead of one-by-one, however this is likely not that common a use case
00403 
00404     for (std::vector<Name>::const_iterator  it = groups.begin(),
00405                                             itEnd = groups.end(); it != itEnd; ++it) {
00406         appendGroup(tree, *it);
00407     }
00408 }

00414 template <typename PointDataTree>
00415 inline void dropGroup(PointDataTree& tree, const Name& group, const bool compact)
00416 {
00417     typedef AttributeSet::Descriptor                              Descriptor;
00418 
00419     typename PointDataTree::LeafCIter iter = tree.cbeginLeaf();
00420 
00421     if (!iter)  return;
00422 
00423     const AttributeSet& attributeSet = iter->attributeSet();
00424     Descriptor::Ptr descriptor = attributeSet.descriptorPtr();
00425 
00426     descriptor->dropGroup(group);
00427 
00428     if (compact) {
00429         compactGroups(tree);
00430     }
00431 }
00432 
00433 
00435 
00436 
00437 template <typename PointDataTree>
00438 inline void dropGroups( PointDataTree& tree,
00439                         const std::vector<Name>& groups)
00440 {
00441     for (std::vector<Name>::const_iterator  it = groups.begin(),
00442                                             itEnd = groups.end(); it != itEnd; ++it) {
00443         dropGroup(tree, *it, /*compact=*/false);
00444     }
00445 
00446     // compaction done once for efficiency
00447 
00448     compactGroups(tree);
00449 }
00450

00455 template <typename PointDataTree>
00456 inline void dropGroups( PointDataTree& tree)
00457 {
00458     typedef AttributeSet::Descriptor        Descriptor;
00459 
00460     using point_group_internal::GroupInfo;
00461 
00462     typename PointDataTree::LeafCIter iter = tree.cbeginLeaf();
00463 
00464     if (!iter)  return;
00465 
00466     const AttributeSet& attributeSet = iter->attributeSet();
00467     Descriptor::Ptr descriptor = attributeSet.descriptorPtr();
00468     GroupInfo groupInfo(attributeSet);
00469 
00470     descriptor->clearGroups();
00471 
00472     // find all indices for group attribute arrays
00473 
00474     std::vector<size_t> indices;
00475     groupInfo.populateGroupIndices(indices);
00476 
00477     // drop these attributes arrays
00478 
00479     dropAttributes(tree, indices);
00480 }

00485 
00486 template <typename PointDataTree>
00487 inline void compactGroups(PointDataTree& tree)
00488 {
00489     typedef AttributeSet::Descriptor                              Descriptor;
00490     typedef Descriptor::GroupIndex                                GroupIndex;
00491 
00492     using point_group_internal::CopyGroupOp;
00493     using point_group_internal::GroupInfo;
00494 
00495     typename PointDataTree::LeafCIter iter = tree.cbeginLeaf();
00496 
00497     if (!iter)  return;
00498 
00499     const AttributeSet& attributeSet = iter->attributeSet();
00500     Descriptor::Ptr descriptor = attributeSet.descriptorPtr();
00501     GroupInfo groupInfo(attributeSet);
00502 
00503     // early exit if not possible to compact
00504 
00505     if (!groupInfo.canCompactGroups())    return;
00506 
00507     // generate a list of group offsets and move them (one-by-one)
00508     // TODO: improve this algorithm to move multiple groups per array at once
00509     // though this is likely not that common a use case
00510 
00511     Name sourceName;
00512     size_t sourceOffset, targetOffset;
00513 
00514     while (groupInfo.requiresMove(sourceName, sourceOffset, targetOffset)) {
00515 
00516         const GroupIndex sourceIndex = attributeSet.groupIndex(sourceOffset);
00517         const GroupIndex targetIndex = attributeSet.groupIndex(targetOffset);
00518 
00519         CopyGroupOp<PointDataTree> copy(tree, targetIndex, sourceIndex);
00520         tbb::parallel_for(typename tree::template LeafManager<PointDataTree>(tree).leafRange(), copy);
00521 
00522         descriptor->setGroup(sourceName, targetOffset);
00523     }
00524 
00525     // drop unused attribute arrays
00526 
00527     std::vector<size_t> indices;
00528     groupInfo.populateGroupIndices(indices);
00529 
00530     const size_t totalAttributesToDrop = groupInfo.unusedGroups() / groupInfo.groupBits();
00531 
00532     assert(totalAttributesToDrop <= indices.size());
00533 
00534     std::vector<size_t> indicesToDrop(indices.end() - totalAttributesToDrop, indices.end());
00535 
00536     dropAttributes(tree, indicesToDrop);
00537 }

00543 template <typename PointDataTree, typename PointIndexTree>
00544 inline void setGroup(   PointDataTree& tree,
00545                         const PointIndexTree& indexTree,
00546                         const std::vector<bool>& membership,
00547                         const Name& group,
00548                         const bool remove)
00549 {
00550     typedef AttributeSet::Descriptor Descriptor;
00551     typedef typename tree::template LeafManager<PointDataTree> LeafManagerT;
00552 
00553     if (membership.size() != pointCount(tree)) {
00554         OPENVDB_THROW(LookupError, "Membership vector size must match number of points.");
00555     }
00556 
00557     using point_group_internal::SetGroupFromIndexOp;
00558 
00559     typename PointDataTree::LeafCIter iter = tree.cbeginLeaf();
00560 
00561     if (!iter)  return;
00562 
00563     const AttributeSet& attributeSet = iter->attributeSet();
00564     const Descriptor& descriptor = attributeSet.descriptor();
00565 
00566     if (!descriptor.hasGroup(group)) {
00567         OPENVDB_THROW(LookupError, "Group must exist on Tree before defining membership.");
00568     }
00569 
00570     const Descriptor::GroupIndex index = attributeSet.groupIndex(group);
00571 
00572     // set membership
00573 
00574     if (remove) {
00575         SetGroupFromIndexOp<PointDataTree,
00576                             PointIndexTree, false> set(indexTree, membership, index);
00577         tbb::parallel_for(LeafManagerT(tree).leafRange(), set);
00578     }
00579     else {
00580         SetGroupFromIndexOp<PointDataTree,
00581                             PointIndexTree, true> set(indexTree, membership, index);
00582         tbb::parallel_for(LeafManagerT(tree).leafRange(), set);
00583     }
00584 }
